page.title: 09STEWARTBY: CHILDRENS VIEWS
page.content: "They should open the swimming pool earlier" "Tennis courts and equipment should be bookable in advance" "There should be a Youth Club". I then went on to ask whether they liked Stewartby on the whole. The answers were: "It is pleasant most of the time but there have been some burglaries and trouble with some teenagers." "It is generally quite friendly because it is so small and you know all the people there." My last question was to ask whether they liked the new management at the brick works. One child said : "They sacked my dad, and so I couldn't care less about them." {Conclusion Obviously, many people dislike living in Stewartby but are tied there by their jobs.
